name: Lane Wars (Android)
description:
Upgrade your castles and spawn characters to destroy the enemy base. Fire spells and layout your army for optimal damage. See how fast you can beat the computer!

Tree House: Rogue, Archer, Ranger (double damage behind ally)
Barracks: Fighter, Soldier, Knight (half damage from ranged)
Magic Tent: Mage, Wizard (chance to insta kill), Necromancer (chance to convert)

Tap and drag units to one of the slots to spawn them at the end of the turn. Click on a building to upgrade to next unit type. Click on spells to unlock them permanently.

Support us on Patreon to play (+ other perks/games)

Note this demo is no longer in development. Play our current project, Sherwood Extreme, for free on Steam!
